original_text: Babylon, I put a trap to catch you, and you did not know about it. Now I have caught you in my trap, because you fought against me. Babylon, I put a trap to catch you, and you did not know about it. Now I have caught you in my trap, because you fought against me. Babylon, I put a trap to catch you, and you did not know about it. Now I have caught you in my trap, because you fought against me. Babylon, I put a trap to catch you, and you did not know about it. Now I have caught you in my trap, because you fought against me. Babylon, I put a trap to catch you,
korean_text: 바벨론아 내가 너를 잡으려고 올무를 놓았더니 네가 깨닫지 못하여 걸렸고 네가 여호와와 싸웠으므로 발각되어 잡혔도다

sentences.original_text: Babylon, I put a trap to catch you
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론아, 내가 너를 잡기 위해 덫을 놓았다

sentences.original_text: and you did not know about it.
Now I have caught you in my trap
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 나의 덫으로 너를 잡았다
